title: Bright 2 Bedroom | Wood Floors | Close to Everything!
posting_body: 269 Anderson Street is located in the popular neighborhood of Bernal Heights, just steps away from Cortland Avenue.
This is a lovely two bedroom one bathroom unit that gets plenty of light.
Original wood flooring, updated kitchen with a stainless steel dishwasher, large refrigerator and gas stove with hood.
Spacious living room with lots of windows.
Both bedrooms are generously sized and look out over the large shared backyard.
A fantastic location near Cortland Avenue, that boasts some of the best dining establishments in the area.
Don't miss out on Black Jet Baking Co.!
Close to public transportation and major freeways.
– High Walkability to restaurants, bakeries, cafes and grocery stores
